mapper.sql: Id, HeaderId, MaterialId, MUnit, OperNumber, BasicNumber, UnitPrice, TaxUnitPrice, AllPrice, Remark, Img, Incidentals, DepotId, AnotherDepotId, TaxRate, TaxMoney, TaxLastMoney, OtherField1, OtherField2, OtherField3, OtherField4, OtherField5, MType
mapper.select: SELECT m.Name MaterialName,m.Model MaterialModel,m.Unit MaterialUnit,u.UName UnitName,u.id UnitId ,d1.name DepotName,d2.name AnotherDepotName,d.* FROM depotitem d LEFT JOIN material m ON d.MaterialId=m.id LEFT JOIN unit u ON m.UnitId=u.id LEFT JOIN depot d1 ON d.DepotId=d1.id LEFT JOIN depot d2 ON d.AnotherDepotId=d2.id WHERE HeaderId=#{headerid} ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT dh.Number,CONCAT(dh.SubType,dh.Type) AS Type, CASE WHEN TYPE='入库' THEN di.BasicNumber WHEN TYPE='出库' THEN 0-di.BasicNumber ELSE 0 END AS BasicNumber, DATE_FORMAT(dh.OperTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') AS OperTime FROM depothead dh INNER JOIN depotitem di ON dh.id=di.HeaderId WHERE TYPE!='其它' AND SubType!='调拨' AND SubType!='礼品充值' AND MaterialId =#{MId} ORDER BY OperTime DESC
